aws::graph::propositions: Amazon's Legal and Regulatory Challenges
Amazon is regularly subject to actual and threatened claims as an innovative company.
Amazon offers a wide range of consumer and business products and services around the world.
Amazon faces litigation from various parties.
Amazon undergoes reviews by external entities.
Amazon faces investigations from various parties.
Amazon is subject to proceedings by governments.
Amazon is subject to proceedings by regulatory authorities.
Claims, litigation, reviews, investigations, and other proceedings may adversely affect Amazon's business.
Claims, litigation, reviews, investigations, and other proceedings may adversely affect Amazon's results of operations.
Amazon faces proceedings involving patent matters.
Amazon faces proceedings involving intellectual property matters.
Amazon faces proceedings involving tax issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving labor and employment issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving the characterization of delivery drivers.
Amazon faces proceedings involving competition issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving antitrust issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving privacy issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving data use issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving data protection issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving data security issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving data localization issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving network security issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving consumer protection issues.
Amazon faces proceedings involving commercial disputes.
Amazon faces proceedings involving goods offered by Amazon.
Amazon faces proceedings involving goods offered by third parties.
Amazon faces proceedings involving services offered by Amazon.
Amazon faces proceedings involving services offered by third parties.
Amazon faces proceedings involving artificial intelligence technologies.
Amazon faces proceedings involving artificial intelligence services.
Amazon faces proceedings involving healthcare matters.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/

text:
##### Claims, Litigation, Government Investigations, and Other Proceedings May Adversely Affect Our Business and Results of Operations

As an innovative company offering a wide range of consumer and business products and services around the world, we are regularly subject to actual and threatened claims, litigation, reviews, investigations, and other proceedings, including proceedings by governments and regulatory authorities, involving a wide range of issues, including patent and other intellectual property matters, taxes, labor and employment (including the characterization of delivery drivers), competition and antitrust, privacy, data use, data protection, data security, data localization, network security, consumer protection, commercial disputes, goods and services offered by us and by third parties (including artificial intelligence technologies and services), healthcare, and other matters.
